EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The status of this lease was changed to {!LeasePayment__c.Status__c}. As the status is still being finalized, please put the corresponding Sales Order to on hold status. Once you get the final notice of this being cancelled/terminated, that is the time this order should be cancelled. Otherwise, the Lease Program team will let you know should this be proceeding for processing/delivery.
{!LeasePayment__c.Link}
